Name: Emperor's Memoirs
Ingredients: 15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
105 ml Thomas Henry Ginger Beer chilled
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: Not particularly alcoholic, but strong in a gingery, spicy way.
History: Created in 2001 by Douglas Ankrah for Akbar, Soho, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Emperor's Memoirs contains 155 calories
